Show Bookings at the
Clermont Performing Arts Center
Booking Inquiries
For booking inquiries,
please contact Brian Foreman
. He handles all show bookings and scheduling. You can reach him via email to discuss availability, pricing, and any special requests.
Contact Brian Foreman
.fl-post-content

About the Clermont
Performing Arts Center
Top-Rated Entertainment From Around the World
Welcome to our city's vibrant hub of creativity, innovation, and expression!
The Clermont Performing Arts Center shines as a hub for both artists and audiences.  The venue is fast becoming known for showcasing a wide range of performances that enchant, motivate, and connect.
As a
cultural landmark
within our city, the
Clermont Performing Arts Center
also serves as a catalyst for economic growth and development. It attracts visitors from near and far, generating revenue for local businesses and stimulating tourism. Hotels, restaurants, and shops thrive in its vicinity, creating a vibrant ecosystem that benefits the entire community. Moreover, the center's presence enhances the overall quality of life, making our city a more desirable place to live, work, and visit.
.fl-post-content
